text: David Phillip Roe (born July 21, 1945) is an American politician and physician. He was the U.S. representative for , serving from 2009 to 2021. He is a member of the Republican Party. From 2017 to 2019, Roe was chairman of the House Committee on Veterans Affairs. Roe announced in January 2020 that he would not run for re-election in 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American physicians Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Phil Roe
